sourceMeaningMnemonic: They <radical>say</radical> <radical>Mona Lisa</radical> had more <kanji>modesty</kanji> than any other woman at the time.
meaningInfo: Leonardo da Vinci picked her for her modesty. She's so modest she shows no emotion.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>modesty</kanji> of Mona Lisa inspired <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai to become more modest.
readingInfo: Have you met Ken the samurai in person? He never smiles, and will never show you his emotions. He's too modest for that.
